name: John Sanchez
text:
*Hula:*
Result given s = 'ABa1'
bin(ord('A'))[2:] = 000001
bin(ord('B'))[2:] = 1000010
bin(ord('a'))[2:] = 100001
bin(ord('1'))[2:] = 10001
" ".join([bin(ord(c))[2:].rjust(8, "0") for c in s]) = "00000001 00000010 00100001 00010001"
Hmm... baka yung position ng letter sa alphabet in binary. Tas may flags kung digit (5th bit), small letter (6th bit). Not sure for other cases.
I'm assuming that s is a parameter (could be any string).
